website_summaries.verdict: A great beginner set of decent quality, but for the price there are better options available.
pros: All pieces come with elongated handles for safe use
Stainless steel construction looks great and is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning
Multi-purpose spatula has a bottle opener and serrated edge for cutting or scraping
Nicely packaged in an aluminum case
cons: The feel of the tools is a bit thin and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Wire brush is garbage! The rest just OK.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see by my photo, the wire brush is pathetic! This photo was taken after ONE use! All of the wires started shedding immediately. I was applying very light pressure FYI. The rest of the tools are just ok. The tongs are cumbersome and difficult to pick up heavy or delicate foods with, but work ok with hamburger buns. If I could return this product I would.
customer_reviews.author: adampeart

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but fell apart during first use.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and nice looking set but poor execution in the grill cleaner. The brush literally fell apart in ONE use!! For this price I expected better. In all fairness I haven’t called the company to request service so I don’t know if they would be helpful but I am very disappointed. Rusted after a short time.... WALK AWAY
customer_reviews.author: JumpingJacks

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wrong items
customer_reviews.text: While the product looks good, I also received duplicate items. I got two cleaning brushes but no spatula. I'll update after I hear back from the manufacturer to see how they resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed because I read all the other reviews and people raving over this set. I got it for my fiancé for Xmas and when he went to use the tongs to grab a steak and flip it, it just kept slipping out. Tongs don't grip well. Looks nice, but not really functional. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Brush Bristle Burger
customer_reviews.text: This set over all is nice but the brush after literally 2 cleanings was falling apart and bristles were falling into the grill, sadly as it was dark outside when we were grilling we didn’t notice that several of the bristles had gotten stuck and made their way into a burger! Thank god that burger got served to an adult who chews their food and found them in his burger and not a child!!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon S.

customer_reviews.title: I'd suggest spending a few extra dollars and getting a better kit.
customer_reviews.text: very cheap... I'd suggest spending a few extra dollars and getting a better kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very weak and not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of which grill set to get. I picked this one because of the high ratings. whoever rated this 5 or 4 stars must have been paid to lie on there review. I opened this excited ready to use my new grill, I bought meat and chicken, as I began, the thons were so weak the meat & chicken was slipping out, it could not grip it. And it was a pain in the hand/wrist to the grill. The wire cleaner started losing its wiring after its 1st cleaning. Very disappointed one star. Stay away from this product if your a serious cook
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: I wish the case were bigger but good tools.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get the tools back into the case and zip it up. If the case were a couple inches bigger it would be easier. I bought a set of tools a couple years ago that came in one of those stainless looking cases with a handle and the case rusted and the lining of the case pulled away. This time I thought I'd try a soft case. I have a summer rental apartment and I try to buy things that will hold up to abuse, low maintenance, look good and work well. Now I find the tools in the bag unzipped with leaves and debris inside.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nathans

customer_reviews.title: Pinchers do not close...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed pretty good when we got it but on my first time trying to use the set it became very obvious that the pinchers things were bent out. The ends did not meet. So I was trying to pick up some veggies I was coming and they could not do it. That was like the main reason for getting the set. Anyways, would not recommend this set for that reason. Everything except it's great and works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Olson

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but a Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to grill this summer and impressed by the looks and ease of use. Like the overall feel and usability of the tools. The product is pricey as compared to Some of the Other grilling tools in the market, but I feel as a 1 time investment, go for it. It is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Well at first I liked these BBQ utensils. They are sturdy, and have velcro straps to keep each one in place inside the case. But, I left mine outside next to the grill and discovered after a few weeks upon opening it that mold had grown inside the case. So gross! It hadn't rained here, so it must have been from the moisture or dew outside. I guess you should store it inside. Anyway, the inside of the case is so disgusting I threw the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Greenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price! Grill brush works great and I love all the accessories. We grill almost every day and all the items are holding up very well. Even nicer to have the case for organization. Highly recommend for yourself or a gift
customer_reviews.author: chelsie bird

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Junk - avoid. If you've been misled and bought complain to Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: An awful product Amazon do themselves no favors stocking this rubbish. The tools are much smaller than you would normally expect. The brush is useless after one use on the BBQ - the bristles are too sparse and weak (see photo). There are plenty of decent BBQ tools. A quality supplier deserves a decent review. These are supplied by opportunists. A "special lightning deal" nonsense! You can't touch and see the product in the flesh buying on line you're trusting the merchant. In this particular case the trust was totally misplaced. This product is criminally bad.
customer_reviews.author: GLYNN A

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Items spatula flexes and bends when using to flip 1/3 lb burgers. The tongs can't pick up much due to the grip not closing all the way. Material is very cheap and flexes with every item. I do not recommend this as a gift as the person will consider you to be a cheap and low person. I found better grill tools at Meijer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Homs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and professional set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift so it hasn't been used yet but I was very impressed with the sturdy and professional appearance of this set. Each tool has it's own designated space and a way to keep each piece anchored in place. As I've said, it hasn't been used yet so I can't attest to it's durability but I'll update this review as I get more information.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Falls short
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. I like the cleaning brush, the skewers, corn on the cob holders, and basting brush. The spatula is fine and works but It's a little difficult to clean. The tongs. The tongs are irritating and don't work well. Trying to grasp things to flip is an adventure. I almost lost a big steak to the ground the other night. So although the kit is cute, I could probably just replace the things I use and like for cheaper
customer_reviews.author: KayMort

customer_reviews.title: Not a sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the quality of the grill tools. I would not list the case as sturdy. We kept this under our grill in the cabinet areas by the tank and we keep our grill covered. Somehow water got inside of our case and molded everything and disintegrated Somehow water got inside of our case and molded everything and disintegrated the side which are cardboard. Not what I was expecting based in description of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ehepner

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The case is nice, but the tools themselves are of extremely low quality. I bought it for my husband's birthday, but the tongs are so weak we can barely pick up a drumstick with them. I missed the window to return, so it looks like I'll be replacing the tools individually. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law just started grilling and this was a great set to start him out with. It comes with all of the essentials and BONUS..it has bottle openers on the tools. It is also nice that it comes with a case because these tools are hard to store in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I really dont understand how it got so many great reviews? The tongs dont even close properly where you can pick something up, the grill brush is so flimsy when you put pressure on it to clean the grates the handle bends and makes cleaning it very hard. Save your money and buy the pieces individually. It might cost more.but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Lenny R

customer_reviews.title: I really love the case and all the tools look well made
customer_reviews.text: My dad has new grill tools on his Christmas wish list, so when I saw them on lightning deals the other day, I bought them. I really love the case and all the tools look well made. Everything you need in one kit....perfect! I think he will love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Loughner

customer_reviews.title: great tools and great case
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Everything you need for grilling (and more -- I will probably never use some of them). Everything works well that I've used. And, the case is awesome. I feel almost guilty saying that you feel like a boss when you take out your metal case and have your grilling tools inside. Happy with the purchase, and if I could go back I would make the same purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with dings in one of the tools (which was inside the aluminum case, indicating it was packaged that way). Further, the spatula and tongs were flimsy for the price paid. For these reasons I have returned this item to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scusa

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think tongs, spatula, and the cleaning brush would be the most sturdy items in this kit but the tongs really are just too flimsy. It' makes it hard to grip onto large chicken breasts and things. The velcro straps in the case tear from the backing pretty easily too. It's decent, but I wish I'd spent a little more on a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Dishner

customer_reviews.title: Absolute JUNK
customer_reviews.text: We took this set to a beachfront home and hung it out on the gas grill that sits outside on the deck. In less than 24 hours every tool had BIG spots of rust. Stainless Steel? I think NOT! Now in a week every tool looks like it has been through several years of weathering. Definitely NOT recommended. Misrepresented J-U-N-K.
customer_reviews.author: Pogoplace

customer_reviews.title: I'll be replacing this.
customer_reviews.text: The flat metal handles are very flimsy and won't hold much weight. Wal-Mart sells a far sturdier set for about half this price, but I couldn't get there in time for a weekend barbeque so I settled for these. The case is nice. That's about all I can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: The grill brush melted the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty terrible product. The spatula and tongs are ok, albeit cheaply made so there's your two stars, but the grill brush is useless. The brush head is made of plastic and it literally melted the first time I used it on the grill. They used a plastic that melts at temperatures grills get to.what a wonderful design choice on their part.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This set is one of the nicest BBQ SETS I've ever owned. The Quality is Superb. If this had a 10 star rating I would have given it. The Packaging was Very Nice. I was looking for a White Light when I opened it. Very Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. Super Flimsy and bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the wire brush, the majority of the first two rows fell out! What is with that? I understand that they will fall out after awhile...but after the FIRST use?? Super disappointed in the quality of these BBQ tools. Everything else seems cheap and super flimsy. Will definitely be asking for a refund. DO not buy. Look into more name brand like Weber. Not one of these 20 piece sets or so. Even though its a good bang for your buck, not the best investment though. Seller please offer me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Micah E

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Fathers Day this year, and he absolutely loves it! Which of course makes me feel great! He could not wait to use it right away. The only thing I don't like about it is the tongs are harder to squeeze and pick up food with than they should be. Otherwise, I love all the tools and my husband does, too. He was really excited about the nifty case all the tools come neatly packed in. All in all, great gift for those men who LOVE to grill and would appreciate a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. They aren't bad but they are clearly cheaply made. I'm ok with it since they are for me and I didn't want to spend a lot on a grill brush and tongs. I would not gift this item though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: This grill set looks great, and works fine. I would rate it higher, but the tools are smaller than I expected. However, for a casual griller, this would be a great present, as it is classy-looking and functional enough to be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grill Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grilling set. I looked at quite a few before buying and chose this one, just because it looked like it had everything I would need. I've been using this all summer and I have no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie House

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set - BBQers Delight
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this for my dad, who is REALLY picky with BBQ equipment. He LOVED it. So then I got one for my husband and he LOVES it. The set is really well made and comes in a great case. Definitely recommend to any griller.
customer_reviews.author: VLNeetle

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Underwhelmed. While I'm not surprised, these are just built cheaply. Corn cob holders are falling apart after being used twice, and the rest of it feels like it's going to go soon. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Home-Complete BBQ Grill Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: The Home-Complete BBQ Grill Tool Set was a gift for my son who enjoys grill cooking and grill eating. He was really pleased with the tool set and has already put it to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Pioneer70

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY - A PERFECT SET OF BBQ TOOLS !
customer_reviews.text: An Amazing, highest quality, beautiful complete set of barbecue tools ! I have owned over the years many high-end BBQ grills but never found , UNTIL NOW, a set of tools worthy of use with those grills.... This set is what I was searching for.... A PERFECT PRODUCT that I HIGHLY recommend to other demanding customers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ tools!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for your bbq! Also comes with its own box with straps so it’s super easy to organize! Haven’t used all the tools yet but the ones I’ve used are sturdy! + easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Tongs are garbage!
customer_reviews.text: They will not hold a piece of meat! The steak I dropped because the tongs are flimsy cost more than this set did. They are long and made out of cheap steel and won't clamp together tightly. Other reviews mention this. I also see other reviews mention the brushes are worthless too. It's not worth the hassle of returning. Easier to throw in the trash. The only upside is the dog got himself a 30.00 steak for supper! Dog says we should keep the set!
customer_reviews.author: David in NC

customer_reviews.title: Seller won't back their product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my kids for on of their wedding gifts.. It stayed unopened until the wedding shower. The box was badly damaged and it was missing one of the cleaning brushes When I contacted the seller they said it was past the date of return. How can a wedding shower registry gift not be covered? I don't recommend doing business with them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Looking Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking case. I purchased this bbq set for my step dad. I wish the tools were a bit more sturdy, but they are usable. The presentation is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Spore

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: On the first use, the brush head rusted to the point that it had to be thrown away after washing. I'm guessing that's why it came with an extra one, but I don't exactly have high hopes for it.
customer_reviews.author: Randomly Me and You Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great spatula and prongs. But Had to throw the rest away. This strange orange/white fuzzy crap was throughout the casing. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Golder

customer_reviews.title: Great little intro kit
customer_reviews.text: Don't do a lot of grilling, so an expensive set doesn't make sense. This is a little smaller size of tools and doesn't feel as sturdy in your hand, but it is functional and great quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Redque

customer_reviews.title: small and efficient
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it, I thought that the utensils looked small, but it turns out they are perfect for what I need. Easy to clean and store a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Spinetti

customer_reviews.title: Decent set, not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Decent buy for the price, i wouldn't say its the best set or most durable. Utensils feel a bit cheap. But i guess its worth what you pay
customer_reviews.author: Anon7

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used yet but will update when we do
customer_reviews.text: Got for my partners birthday gift, he liked it. The case is really nice too. He hasn’t used it due to weather. So once he does and they work well I’ll rate higher or if not lower. Depends,
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday present for my boyfriend over a year ago and what a great buy it was. He uses it all the time and in the winter months we can put it all in the case and store it above the fridge so it isn't in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Small and average
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting so much more..: it’s just average. The scraper already had rust on it. It was smaller then I thought it would be too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: She loved it, but hasn't tried it yet
customer_reviews.text: It is incredibly well packaged. I bought this as a gift for a neighbor who just had a new outdoor bar-b-cue installed. She loved it, but hasn't tried it yet. I gave it a good review because she was pleased. But sellers have to realize that buyers can't always provide reviews on products they purchase that reflect actual use of the product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking box (and tools)
customer_reviews.text: Taking one star for the tongs, they are not most comfortable bbq tongs i used at all. I suppose can get used to them, but their "grabbing power" is not what i had in mind. Otherwise very good - price included.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shoykhet

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This set rusted very quickly. While the case when opened looked like decent quality but didn't last very long. The inside of the set became detached from the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Ab97435

customer_reviews.title: ... once since I received it but so far I love them. It comes in a nice metal case ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been able to use the product once since I received it but so far I love them. It comes in a nice metal case and each piece seems to be very high quality. The seller has also touched based with me at each point in the process to make sure I am happy, which I am!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 2 different couples
customer_reviews.text: Both were gifts, one is 4yrs old. Still in great condition. Very sturdy, case is great for keeping all the items together!
customer_reviews.author: beamsago

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN fresh out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box I notice it's already broken! The carry box is banged up, the scrapper is already messed up, and the corn holders holder isn't fully attached. And i have a random piece in the box I have no clue what it broke off of. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap set for cheap price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can’t complain a ton but this really is a cheap grill set. Cheap bag and flimsy utensils. Not recommended for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: foote410

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible tool set. The brush bristles are quite soft, and started falling off after a dozen uses. The tongs are not strong enough to squeeze a steak of any size. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these grill tools for my son and son-in-law as Christmas gifts. Both were very pleased with the various tools in the nice metal carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: M.E. McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for grill enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was excited to receive this tool set in time for grilling season. We haven't used it yet, but it comes in a nice case and has what you need to grill.
customer_reviews.author: SallySue

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then what you purchase at a store
customer_reviews.text: I like this set because it got it for camping and it's actually a more reasonable size then the normal grilling tools you buy from a retail store
customer_reviews.author: Rayhn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in nice box but tongs are useless. Might as well pitch them as they do not function as intended.
customer_reviews.author: DrEnDebe

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Bought off a wedding registry. Was much bigger than they expected but love them anyways. Comes in a case that is shipped in an easy to wrap box.
customer_reviews.author: cmirrione

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and just received one
customer_reviews.text: I don’t received this product. This is the reason for return the other one. I can change my stars when this is fixed
customer_reviews.author: alessandra almeida

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grand son. He is learning to BBQ and i thought is would be nice to have his very own
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved it. It came in time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my father for his birthday. He absolutely loved it. It came in time, in great shape and with everything it had described. When I get an outdoor grill, this will definitely be on buy list to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Gift it for my buddy's house warming bbq. He used it the same day. It's a nice set of bbq utensils.
customer_reviews.author: xxgxx

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit, the tongs and spatula are kinda weak. But i rarely need anything stronger, if you're cooking anything large, you'll want something that won't bend as much.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbowdove

customer_reviews.title: Very nice BBQ set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice BBQ set. I ordered this as a gift for a family member. We are all very impressed with the quality and the contents of the set. It has everything you need and a nice place to store everything.
customer_reviews.author: hennypenny

customer_reviews.title: A perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Father’s Day and he LOVES it! Very well made tools and the case is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Regina

customer_reviews.title: The grill brush melts in the heat.
customer_reviews.text: The brush that is used to brush the grill melted in the heat. It left melted rubber on my grill. The brush can only be used on a cold grill. They should warn customers of this. The grilling set is otherwise OK.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Milford

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. Only negative thing was the tongs weren’t quite bent right in manufacturing, but with some elbow grease I got them into shape. Seem to be good quality steel.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good set. Would be better with closeable design for tongs and need to include meat fork.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, just don’t love the tongs since they don’t close. Wish a meat fork was included as well. But it isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: S.No.

customer_reviews.title: Tongs are weak, but great set otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The tongs this set comes with are kinda worthless honestly. If you NEED set of tongs these will most likely disappoint. I mostly needed everything but the tongs for the outdoor setup so not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Accilien

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This tool set is great! The case it comes in is very handy and keeps everything very secure inside. All of the utensils are well made. My only complaint would be that the spatula is a little flimsy when flipping heavier items but overall this is a great product. I would definitely purchase again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: King of the Grill
customer_reviews.text: Great product that looks good and a case to protect it all. Product looks very nice at first look and does the job it is suppose to. I think any dad would love this as a gift and enjoying using it as well. The case helps give it a more of "The King of the Grill" look and feel. No complaints, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Codi L Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set. We’ve used it all summer. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Purchased this for my fiance for Christmas and he fell in love. It had everything he wanted and more. Sturdy appliances that are well made and fantastic for their job. The case is awesome for storage. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: It presents well, many items in the case. I assume all is well. Did not receive any feedback.
customer_reviews.author: K. Meloche

customer_reviews.title: alot of fair quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I found it all to be very flimsy and of cheap quality. u get alot of stuff but none of it is great.
customer_reviews.author: karen schulze

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy, and I have left it outside now for 6 months and the case has not rusted.
customer_reviews.author: jessica travis

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS A GIFT AND VERY WELL RECEIVED
customer_reviews.text: The kit that it came in was great. The recipient loved it. Because it was a gift, I cannot rate the product.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Molik

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The metal is not that sturdy. The pieces easily bend. The Tong's are horrible.. they do not hold anything.. the brush is ok.. only thing I really liked was the case
customer_reviews.author: Carlos B.

customer_reviews.title: Watch for mold!
customer_reviews.text: This had lots of great reviews, which is why we bout it. It has worked well for us up until about a week ago, come to find out... the case has completely molded!
customer_reviews.author: There Are Some Who Call Me Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product as described, fast delivery. All the individual items I need in a really cool metal case. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bendremer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This was so much nicer than I had imagined it would be. Such a great price for a quality product. The case was beautiful! Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift and Highly Suggested
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and was a great birthday present! He really enjoys it, and it was well worth the price. He has used it a few times already and the set has been easy to clean and extremely handy!
customer_reviews.author: Nici

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for a bridal shower.  The bride expressed her like of it
customer_reviews.text: This was a bridal shower gift. So I am unable to give this a rating
customer_reviews.author: Christy VanWyk

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for son in law who barbecues a lot, and boy, was he impressed! He feels like a real professional chef when he goes out with his case of handsome and expensive looking tools!
customer_reviews.author: paisley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: If you need a quick fix for all these tools, these will last you a few seasons. Grill cleaner bristles rusted after 1 use, tongs and spatula are slightly flimsy. Case is pretty useless in my opinion. Price is very low so you get what you pay for, impressive you can get so much for so little, but obviously low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Q Creech

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and scuffed, was not brand new
customer_reviews.text: My spatula was scuffed and had black dirty markets in the metal like it was stained. I'm assuming I got someone elses returned item here. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Great gift it’s. Even comes with its own case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a wedding gift for my son and daughter in law which they picked out so I know they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: very nice set!!! It comes in a nice box!! We loved the look. I thought the materials were cheap but the set turned out great!!! We loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamella Botero

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: They work just as advertised. 10/10 no ragrets, not even a single letter.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set!! Great gift for Dad. I bought this so my just could have of his BBQ tools in one spot where he always knew where they were. BBQ tools are huge and don't really fit anywhere in our kitchen. So, the case is a great idea. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AccrualCat

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality - Not comfortable with all the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: Just really low quality. Came with dented handles, was dirty, and the the tools are pretty much worthless. Bought this on a lightning deal and still feel ripped off...lol.
customer_reviews.author: Stevoo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: Have as a wedding shower gift - they loved it and had all the tools they need for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda R

customer_reviews.title: Good grilling tool set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift and the recipient loved it. Case was sturdy and the tools inside were a good quality also.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Parker

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty nice set. I dont' use half of the stuff they included but what I have used has been great.
customer_reviews.author: MissMtoP

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for him
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my husband. He loves to grill & this makes it better
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Weak utensils
customer_reviews.text: Not what you would expect. Everything seems to be made of a cheap quality since the metal bends a lot with normal use. The tongs are useless because they flex too much when trying to grab something off of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Essemel

product_meta.title: Home-Complete BBQ Grill Tool Set- 16 Piece Stainless Steel Barbecue Grilling Accessories with Aluminum Case, Spatula, Tongs, Skewers
feature_bullets: COMPLETE SET- This high quality set comes with everything needed for a successful cook out. Easily season steaks with the basting brush, flip hot dogs or burgers the spatula or tongs, eat corn with the corn holders or grill kabobs with the skewers.

CONVENIENT STORAGE- With a heavy duty aluminum case, you can easily store this bbq set between uses and ensure each tool is neatly organized. The case also makes it easy to take these tools on-the-go to picnics, while camping, tailgating and more.

QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL- Each barbecue tool is made from quality stainless steel which is rust resistant for long-lasting reliability. Stainless steel tools are also more durable than wood alternatives as they will not crack after extended use.

PERFECT GIFT- This complete set of barbeque accessories is an ideal gift for any avid griller or cook. It is perfect for Father’s Day, birthdays, Christmas, wedding showers, as a housewarming present, and more.

PRODUCT DETAILS- 16 piece set includes essentials like swiss knife, spatula, tongs, basting brush, cleaning brush, corn holders and skewers. Spatula has built in bottle opener. Material: Stainless Steel with heat-safe handles. Dishwasher Safe.
